start_lang: To proceed to the bot please select your language.
not_account: This account doesnt exists , please type the command /start
name: Name
add_wallet_desc:
💡 Your _CURRENCY_ wallet active currently: 
 _WALLET_ 
It will be used in the future for withdrawals
deposit_desc:
Every deposit to the next *_CURRENCY_* address will be recognized as an investment:
💳 Addresss: `_WALLET_` 
💵 Currency: *_CURRENCY_* 
➖ Min deposit: *_MIN_DEPOSIT_ _CURRENCY_* 
➕ Max deposit: *_MAX_DEPOSIT_ _CURRENCY_* 
💰 Daily earn: *_DAILY_EARN_ %* 
⏳ Contract time: *_INVEST_TIME_*  
💸 Total earns: *_PLAN_EARN_ _CURRENCY_*

*Note:*
If the sum doesnt meet our conditions it will be losed.
withdraw_desc:
The withdrawal of funds is made automatically to your *_CURRENCY_* address :
💳 Wallet: `_WALLET_`
💰 Balance: *_BALANCE_ _CURRENCY_*
➖ Min withdraw:  *_MIN_WITHDRAW_*
💸 Withdraw fee: *_FEE_ _CURRENCY_*
not_funds: Not enought funds to make the withdraw
